docs.snippet: N.F.L. owners passed a much-debated rule that penalizes players for lowering their helmet and using it as a battering ram to ward off opponents....
docs.lead_paragraph: N.F.L. owners passed a much-debated rule that penalizes players for lowering their helmet and using it as a battering ram to ward off opponents.
docs.abstract: NFL owners overwhelmingly pass rule that will prohibit runners and defenders from lowering their heads and striking forcible blow with helmets when outside tackle box; rule is aimed at reducing concussions, and related litigation faced by NFL.

headline.seo: N.F.L. Adopts Helmet Rule and Alters Tuck Rule
headline.main: Emphasizing Safety, N.F.L. Passes Rule on Helmet Hits
headline.print_headline: Emphasizing Safety, N.F.L. Passes Rule on Helmet Hits

docs.snippet: The rookie Bengals linebacker Vontaze Burfict earned the most money in the N.F.L.’s performance-based pay program....
docs.lead_paragraph: The rookie Bengals linebacker Vontaze Burfict earned the most money in the N.F.L.’s performance-based pay program.
docs.abstract: Rookie Cincinnati Bengals linebacker Vontaze Burfict earned most money in NFL's performance-based pay program, receiving extra $299,465 for playing time that far exceeded his salary level.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Chicago Bears are parting ways with the veteran linebacker Brian Urlacher, the face of the franchise, after 13 years.
docs.abstract: Veteran Chicago Bears linebacker Brian Urlacher will become free agent after impasse in contract negotiations with team, marking end of era for franchise.

headline.seo: Urlacher Era Is Over for Bears
headline.main: Urlacher Era Fades Away in Chicago
headline.print_headline: Urlacher Era Fades Away In Chicago

docs.snippet: Quarterback Eli Manning is willing to help the Giants reach a new contract with Victor Cruz, who had 10 touchdown catches last season....
docs.lead_paragraph: Quarterback Eli Manning is willing to help the Giants reach a new contract with Victor Cruz, who had 10 touchdown catches last season.
docs.abstract: New York Giants quarterback Eli Manning signals that he is willing to renegotiate his own contract in order to help team reach new deal with receiver Victor Cruz.

headline.seo: Giants’ Manning Open to Redoing His Deal to Keep Cruz
headline.main: Manning Open to Redoing His Deal to Keep Cruz
headline.print_headline: Manning Open to Redoing His Deal to Keep Cruz

docs.snippet: Two Torrington High School athletes were charged with sexually assaulting 13-year-old girls....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two Torrington High School athletes were charged with sexually assaulting 13-year-old girls.
docs.abstract: Sexual assault charges against Torrington High School athletes Edgar A Gonzalez and Joan M Toribio prompts people to draw online comparisons to Steubenville, Ohio, rape case, which gained national attention via social media and revealed bullying toward the victim from students and others who displayed concern for the town's football program.

headline.seo: Sexual Assault Charges in Torrington, Conn., Are Dissected in Social Media
headline.main: Sex Charges in Connecticut Are Dissected on Internet
headline.print_headline: Sex Charges in Connecticut Are Dissected on Internet

docs.snippet: SAN JOSE, Calif. — Syracuse Coach Jim Boeheim played down the latest reports about investigations into his basketball program, suggesting that there was nothing new to revelations on Wednesday, the day before the Orange’s N.C.A.A. to...
docs.lead_paragraph:
SAN JOSE, Calif. — Syracuse Coach Jim Boeheim played down the latest reports about investigations into his basketball program, suggesting that there was nothing new to revelations on Wednesday, the day before the Orange’s N.C.A.A. tournament opener against Montana.
 
“Same story they had last year at this time,” Boeheim said during a news conference. “I guess that’s annual. I guess next year we’ll get it again.”
docs.abstract: College Basketball Men's Roundup; Syracuse men's basketball coach Jim Boeheim plays down reports about an NCAA investigation of his program day before opening the tournament against Montana; other college basketball news noted. (M)/

headline.main: Syracuse Arrives Amid Reports of an Inquiry
